Pre-Game Insights: Dallas comes into the matchup with Memphis after losing four games in a row.
The Grizzlies are 2-2 against Southwest Division teams.
Memphis ranks second in the NBA with 30.5 assists per game led by Desmond Bane averaging 5.2.
The Mavericks are 4-2 against the rest of the division.
Dallas ranks fourth in the Western Conference shooting 37.3% from 3-point range.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies average 14.1 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.2 more made shots on average than the 12.9 per game the Mavericks give up.
The Mavericks average 13.3 made 3-pointers per game this season, 0.3 fewer makes per game than the Grizzlies allow.
Jaren Jackson Jr. is averaging 22.3 points, 6.2 rebounds and 1.6 blocks for the Grizzlies.
Kyrie Irving is averaging 24.3 points and 4.9 assists for the Mavericks.
Others: The Grizzlies are 5-5 in their last 10 games, averaging 124.8 points, 50.7 rebounds, 30.7 assists, 9.2 steals and 5.4 blocks per game while shooting 46.5% from the field.
Their opponents have averaged 118.6 points per game.
The Mavericks are 4-6 in their last 10 games, averaging 112.3 points, 42.2 rebounds, 23.3 assists, 7.7 steals and 7.1 blocks per game while shooting 47.0% from the field.
The Grizzlies have several injured players, including Luke Kennard, Marcus Smart, John Konchar, Santi Aldama, Yuki Kawamura, Vince Williams Jr., Ja Morant, and GG Jackson II.
The Mavericks have several injured players, including Dante Exum, Luka Doncic, and Kyrie Irving.
